Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: Gary L Bahr
Reviews.Content: This is an affordable camera that looks realistic from a distance and will not fall apart like some cheaper cameras.  Would recommend if price is an issue.

Reviews.Title: Made of metal
Reviews.Author: L. Stacey
Reviews.Content: This fake camera is made of metal. Looks real from about 10 feet or more. You need the distance to make the lense look real. I added several of them to a real camera system I got from costco. Made it look like I have better camera coverage. I found and bought more of them from walmart.com for aroundhalf the price with 97 cent shipping.
